name: Highway Outta Hell
description:
This game was developed as a submission for Mini Jam 69: Hell.

You, the most professional master thief in the city, find your everlasting rest. Of course you wake up in hell, but this can't stop you to steal some mystic cards from the devil, that can help you escape your punishment...

Credits
Created by Gamewerkstatt JUKUZ Aschaffenburg - to be more precise:
Programming: Robin Finkelmann, Eduard Ott , Philip Tillmans
Graphics: Maria Fellhauer, Alexander Voß
Leveldesign: Philip Tillmans, Eduard Ott
Sounddesign: Eduard Ott
Thanks to: Christian Streinz (Coded[]Art)
